course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Art of Singing
course.description: This course is designed as an introduction to the vocal arts in the Western classical music and musical theater tradition. Topics covered will include vocal production, diction, study of relevant operatic, art song and musical theater repertoire, text analysis, and stage presence. The ultimate goal of the course will be to give students the opportunity to cultivate their voices through in-class group instruction and public performance in a positive, open environment. Previous knowledge of music is required for this course. Students should have some experience in reading music as will as the ability to sing.
